Read 'Change Log' textfile to read the change log ....

Latest update with DLC included. We included the free Holiday Celebration Pack as well as
The Outdoors DLC this time

Explore the Outdoors
New surprises await your Sims out in the wilderness. Explore the all-new
destination of Granite Falls, where your Sims can go camping, sing songs or
tell ghost stories around the campfire, and enjoy all sorts of new activities

Explore the All-new Destination of Granite Falls
Your Sims can escape from their everyday lives into the pine-filled air of
Granite Falls. Lay back for a night of stargazing and let your Sims
imaginations run wild, or join a game of horseshoes to unwind with some
friendly competition. Alternatively, find out what adventure awaits within
the nearby bramble patch. There are tons of things to do in Granite Falls

Set Up the Perfect Camp
No camping trip is complete without the proper supplies. Be sure to outfit
your Sims with a tent and new hiking gear. Treat your Sims to some roasted
marshmallows and share fireside stories of adventure, wonder
and fright with the gang

Create Exotic Potions as an Herbalist
Build your Sims herbalism skill to create a variety of useful potions,
ranging from insect repellent to a concoction that can help soothe a tense
Sim. This new skill will be useful to help Sims identify which wild plants
are edible or poisonous

Update v1.4.83.1010

Genealogy is here Explore the lineage of your Sims, their names, faces, and
relationships Remember who they are to one another

In addition to traveling through the lineage of your Sims, with this update
you can now dress up Grandma Betty in some new Valentines clothing, or just
hang around with a gnome and a bear


INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

 1. DISABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING 'Setup' ....
 2. INSTALL IT TO THE SAME LOCATION WHERE YOU HAVE INSTALLED THE SIMS 4 (REMOVE THE DEFAULT DIRECTORY THAT IS SPECIFIED IN THE INSTALLER , CLICK ON BROWSE AND SPECIFY THE DIRECTORY WHERE U HAVE INSTALLED YOUR SIMS 4) ...
 3. ADD THE SIMS 4 GAME FOLDER TO THE EXCLUSION/EXCEPTION LIST OF YOUR ANTIVIRUS OTHERWISE YOUR ANTIVIRUS WILL CHANGE THE 'TS4.exe' FILE INTO A TEMPORARY FILE OR JUST DELETE IT WHICH WON'T LET THE GAME TO RUN, AFTER THIS STEP, U CAN ENABLE YOUR ANTIVIRUS....

IF U HAVE ALREADY CREATED AN EXCEPTION FOR IT THEN IGNORE STEP 3...

 TIPS: 

 -IF AFTER UPDATE , U DON'T FIND 'TS4.exe' , THEN IT MEANS YOUR ANTIVIRUS HAS BLOCKED IT, RESTORE IT FROM ANTIVIRUS QUARANTINE ZONE OR REINSTALL UPDATE WITH ANTIVIRUS DISABLED. (WINDOWS DEFENDER IS THE DEFAULT ANTIVIRUS)....

 -MAKE SURE BOTH VISUAL C++ ARE INSTALLED TO AVOID ANY MVS.dll ERROR OR rld.dll ERROR....

 -IF U GET AN ERROR MESSAGE STATING THAT THE GAME DATA IS MISSING, THEN IT MEANS U HAVE INSTALLED THE UPDATE IN THE WRONG LOCATION ...

 -IF U GET AN INITIALISATION FAILED ERROR, THEN IT MEANS U R MISSING NECESSARY PREVIOUS UPDATE AS ALREADY STATED , ATLEAST OR ABOVE UPDATE VERSION 1.0.732.20 IS REQUIRED.....

 -IF SOME DLC'S ARE MISSING , COMPLETELY EXIT ORIGIN AND THEN PLAY THE GAME ....

JUST DO EVERYTHING LIKE U DID FOR THE PREVIOUS UPDATE :) , OPEN THE GAME FROM 'TS4.exe' FROM GAME DIRECTORY OR THE DESKTOP SHORTCUT ...

ALWAYS OPEN THE GAME USING 'Run as administrator' TO AVOID ANY CRASH....

ALL CREDIT GOES TO RELOADED FOR THE HARD WORK....

IF U R STILL UNABLE TO GET IT WORKING, INBOX ME AT KICKASS OR ON MY FACEBOOK PAGE ....
